thread.title: Police: Car hits tree, bursts into flames killing man, dog
thread.title_full: Police: Car hits tree, bursts into flames killing man, dog - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Police: Car hits tree, bursts into flames killing man, dog
text:
NEWPORT, N.H. (AP) - Police say a car struck a tree and burst into flames in western New Hampshire, leaving a man and a dog dead.
WMUR-TV reports crews were called to John Stark Highway in Newport early Friday morning.
Police say the car was traveling east when it crossed the center line and veered off the highway, crashed into a large tree and caught fire.
The driver and a dog were pronounced dead at the scene. A second dog was taken to a veterinary clinic to be treated.
Authorities have not released the driver's name.
